oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Big Ridge Dam, Loyston, Tennessee almost completed
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frykholm, C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For current rights information, please visit: http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001200
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows the Big Ridge Dam, near completion, in Loyston, Tennessee. According to the writing on the back of the photo, it was built by Co. 297 in late 1934 and early 1935.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
